title: links for 2006-01-24
content:
• Achewood - January 23, 2006
    "I... I'm afraid I don't understand. Does that mean you don't eat cheese?"
    (tags: comics funny)
  • Disemvoweling - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
    "Disemvoweling (also spelled disemvowelling) is a technique used by forum moderators to suppress trollage, vandalism, and other rude behavior in online discourse by removing all the vowels from the offending material."
    (tags: nifty metablogging socialsoftware)
  • franklinmint.fm: Atom Over XMPP Hack For a Book That Wasn't To Be
    "Instead of a typical XMPP IM message, we'll show how to send Atom Entry documents as XMPP payloads."
    (tags: rss atom hackingfeeds jabber syndication xmpp)
  • Hitachi Global Storage Technologies | Support | Knowledge Base
    These sounds are all incredibly painful to hear. "My hard drive is experiencing some strange noises but I am unsure if the drive is failing. How can I determine if the noises are due to a failing hard drive?"
    (tags: hardware repair ouch pain)
  • Sam Ruby: Photocasting Hyperbole
    "Let's face it, the Internet is a rough place."
    (tags: rss atom syndication apple iphoto photocasting)
  • DOM Scripting: Easier CSS rules through DOM Scripting
    "Say you want to style form fields. You probably want to apply different styles to your text inputs, your submit buttons, your checkboxes, etc. But they all share the same tag name, input, so you can't just use an element selector in your CSS."
    (tags: dom css webdev js)
  • MochiKit A lightweight Javascript library
    "MochiKit 1.2 is now available [download]."
    (tags: javascript webdev mochikit ajax)
  • How to Do What You Love
    "If you know you can love work, you're in the home stretch, and if you know what work you love, you're practically there. "
    (tags: essay work)
  • Instant Messaging in Frontier/Radio
    "tcp.im is an instant messaging client and server framework for Frontier and Radio UserLand."
    (tags: jabber radio opml usertalk frontier)
